item.description:
It's our 2nd Annual Movie Night at REI:

From the Producer's Website:

"An award-winning feature film about the world's toughest mountain bike race, which traverses over 2700 miles along the Continental Divide in the Rocky Mountains. The film weaves the story of three characters' experiences with immense mountain beauty and small-town culture as they attempt to pedal from Banff, Canada to a small, dusty crossing on the Mexican border."

http://www.ridethedividemovie.com/

Don't miss this fun evening to connect with friends with the option to have dinner together with friends afterward!

Price of $3.50 covers the movie only...dinner is on your own.  For those not comfortable with paypal, you may send me a check:

Robert Fox

1 The Great Rd.

Woburn, MA 01801

No Payments accepted at the door.  Payments MUST be received by December 20th.

http://www.ridethedividemovie.com/

Dinner (not included in the $3.50 fee) will be following the movie at Mandarin (across the street)  - SORRY - NO MORE RSVP's for Dinner ACCEPTED - AT MAX number.

296 Salem Street
Reading MA 01867
(781) 942-8200

And remember....get out there!!

Rob Fox, Organizer/Founder
item.how_to_find_us: My cell on the day of the event is 617-894-8454
item.name: Movie Night at REI: "Ride The Divide" and Optional Dinner Afterward - Mandarin
